Summary: Biochemical reaction from desmethyl regorafenib to n-desmethyl regorafenib n-oxide. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from regorafenib to regorafenib N-oxide. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from regorafenib to regorafenib metabolite m3. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP2J2.
Biochemical reaction from regorafenib N-oxide to regorafenib metabolite m8. This interaction is catalyzed by UGT1A9.
Biochemical reaction from regorafenib N-oxide to n-desmethyl regorafenib n-oxide.
Biochemical reaction from n-desmethyl regorafenib n-oxide to desmethyl regorafenib.
Biochemical reaction from regorafenib to regorafenib glucuronide. This interaction is catalyzed by UGT1A9.
Biochemical reaction from regorafenib metabolite m3 to desmethyl regorafenib. This interaction is catalyzed by ADH1A.
Biochemical reaction from regorafenib N-oxide to regorafenib.
Biochemical reaction from regorafenib metabolite m8 to regorafenib glucuronide.
